title: MY ACCOUNT BANNED?????????
body: my account permanently suspended due to 3rd party programs!?!?!?! all i have is curse and i get banned my account had 500$ worth of skins and you perma ban me for cheating? why the hell would i cheat on a 500$ account on a free to play game!!?!? {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}  honestly think this is ridiculous... and i want my account back...

replies.body: i had a custom map skin thingy a couple of weeks before my ban but i cant remember which program it was?
As with any tool that modifies game files you use them **AT YOUR OWN RISK**, while Riot may not ban for most things it is still technically against the ToS to modify any of your games files.

3rd Party/Scripting account bans are some of the most accurate, since the detections are usually solid and easily actioned, they do not rely on context in the way that behaviour bans do. [Ticketing support to appeal your ban is your best bet](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), but if they say no, it means on second look the ban was still legitimate.

Riot/support cannot tell you what was detected because that would also tell you and anyone you chose to share the information with what was NOT detected and thus it compromises further investigations.

An account will not have a punishment removed unless it was made in error.
___

So onto what could have caused this ban.

[This is a list of some of the more common programs detailing what is and isn't allowed. Take a look through there for me.  ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/5dmkJinG-3rd-party-applicationsmodifications-whats-allowed-and-what-isnt)

Otherwise, are you using any peripheral programs? Anything that lets you use custom skins or gives you info? Riot won't ban for custom skins or harmless info, but some of the programs that offer those services also offer services that are punishable, and you will be banned for using those programs regardless of whether you were using the disallowed feature or not.
